segments.text: I see the girl reaching up toward the boy, her hand open and waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s about to get the best treat ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice she’s not even looking at the stool or the water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s completely focused on the cookies, and nothing else seems to matter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she trusts the boy to hand her a cookie without any trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and the floor is getting more slippery by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll even notice if the boy falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this whole scene is about to go wrong in so many ways.
segments.speaker: PAR
